    Data: Exposures of included participants

    btESBL_exposures.Rd

    These data are recorded in long format. Covariate values are included in columns, and there is one row for each day where a covariate value changes or when the participant has their final observation (i.e date of censoring). So, if a participant has a covariate value that changes from 1 to 0 on subsequent rows, the covariate value should be interpreted as being 1 up until the day of change

    btESBL_exposures

    Format

    A data frame with 1838 rows and 26 variables:

    pid

    Unique patient identifier

    assess_type

    Day of observation (day 0=enrolment day)

    died

    1=died on day of current observation

    hosp

    1=hospitalised on day of current observation, 0 =not

    amoxy

    Exposure to amoxicillin on day of observation

    genta

    Exposure to gentamicin on day of observation

    azithro

    Exposure to azithromycin on day of observation

    tb

    Exposure to first-line TB treatment on day of observation

    benzy

    Exposure to penicillin on day of observation

    fluco

    Exposure to fluconazole on day of observation

    ampho

    Exposure to amphotericin on day of observation

    quin

    Exposure to quinine on day of observation

    chlora

    Exposure to chloraquine on day of observation

    coart

    Exposure to artemether/lumefantrine on day of observation

    cipro

    Exposure to ciprofloxacin on day of observation

    coamo

    Exposure to co-amoxiclav on day of observation

    arte

    Exposure to artesunate on day of observation

    cotri

    Exposure to co-trimoxazole on day of observation

    clinda

    Exposure to clindamicin on day of observation

    doxy

    Exposure to doxycycline on day of observation

    erythro

    Exposure to erythomycin on day of observation

    acicl

    Exposure to aciclovir on day of observation

    fluclox

    Exposure to flucloxacillin on day of observation

    metro

    Exposure to metronidazole on day of observation

    strepto

    Exposure to streptomicin on day of observation
